task.title: How to Join a Club on Campus
task.shortdesc: Becoming a part of a group on campus will help you to meet other students with similar interests and can expand your passion or hobby.

taskbody.context:
Joining a club is extremely easy for students at Virginia Tech whether you are a first year student, transfer student, or a student who is looking for a change. Follow these steps to learn about how to become a part of our over 750 clubs.
First, visit the Gobblerconnect website and sign in with your PID and password, which you created at your transfer student orientation.
If you forget your PID password, select "Forgot password" and follow those directions to creating a new password.
Once you have a new password, begin these steps again from the beginning.
Once you are logged on, browse through the various club options by clicking on "Organizations" in the top right corner of the page.
Select to browse the clubs by category or by alphabetical order with the directory at the left-hand side of the page.
Once you find an orgnaization you're interested in, click on its title and you will be redirected to its personal page with more information about the group.
From here, select "Join Organization" at the top, middle of the page.
When you've selected to join the organization, your membership will be listed as "Pending" and more information will be directed to your email.
After you are contacted by the organization, follow through communication with them to assure your place in the club and attend their events!
